channel.title: Making and npc walk freely?
channel.description:
Well when you spawn an npc(::npc ####) it spawns and it walks. But when i put it in autospawn.cfg it won't walk. This is what i have. [code]spawn = 1629 3057 9569 0 3053 9566 3053 9579 0 Arctic Demon[/code]
Now why won't it walk. By the way Arctic Demon = custom summoning npc from Galkon. And no it's not the only one that won't walk, abyssal demon and chaos ele won't move either. The only npc that this has worked for was jad, and i've tried changing walk type to 1 and 2 still won't walk. I'm not stupid and i know how the whole square works for the rangex and rangey bottom left to top right or w\e. Please help me.

item.title: Making and npc walk freely?
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

Well when you spawn an npc(::npc ####) it spawns and it walks. But when i put it in autospawn.cfg it won’t walk. This is what i have.

spawn = 1629	3057	9569	0	3053	9566	3053	9579	0	Arctic Demon

Now why won’t it walk. By the way Arctic Demon = custom summoning npc from Galkon. And no it’s not the only one that won’t walk, abyssal demon and chaos ele won’t move either. The only npc that this has worked for was jad, and i’ve tried changing walk type to 1 and 2 still won’t walk. I’m not stupid and i know how the whole square works for the rangex and rangey bottom left to top right or w\e. Please help me.

Read full topic
